/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. A traffic light stands sentinel at the intersection, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
